SEARCH

Class BuildStack

java.lang.Object
BuildStack
public class BuildStack extends Object
Class which builds and returns a sorted stack from user input.

After gathering a string of integers from user input, this class converts them to integers and populates them into a stack using the Java Collections Stack class. The final stack is populated in ascending order and returned. In other words, the largest element will be at the top of the stack and popped first.

(Maintenance task: this code was reused and modified from BuildLinkedList class.)

Since:
1.0, 6/7/24

    • getIntegerString

      public static String getIntegerString()
      Method returns a string of integers, separated by spaces, from Scanned user input. Input is gathered by opening and closing an instance of the Scanner class. (Maintenance task: this code was reused from BuildLinkedList class.)
      Returns:
      numString , a string of integers separated by spaces

    • parseStringsIntoInts

      public static int[] parseStringsIntoInts(String numString)
      Method accepts string input of integers, separates and parses the integers, and populates them into an array of integers, which is returned.

      (Maintenance task: this code was reused from BuildLinkedList class.)

      Parameters:
      numString - a string of space-delineated integers
      Returns:
      numList an array of integers

    • sortIntegersIntoStack

      public static Stack<Integer> sortIntegersIntoStack(int[] numList, Stack<Integer> intStack)
      Sorts and inserts, in ascending order, a list of integers into an empty Stack object of type Integer, which is returned. In other words, the largest element will be at the top of the stack and popped first.

      (Maintenance task: this code was reused and modified from BuildLinkedList class.)

      Parameters:
      numList - an array of integers
      intStack - an empty Stack object of type Integer
      Returns:
      intStack, populated with the integers

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args)
      Driver code which runs BuildStack class.

      Creates an empty Stack object of type Integer, gets string integer input from user, parses the string into integers, and sorts and inserts integers into a Stack object. The final stack object is printed (but not returned).

      (Maintenance task: this code was reused and modified from BuildLinkedList class.)

      Parameters:
      args - optional command line arguments
